page.title: 06THE BLACK SWAN,GRENDON.
page.content: The Black Swan public house is situated on the A5 at Grendon.Most of the trade is local,but long distance travellers do often call in for a pint of beer.On average seven barrels of beer are consumed a week.Bitter is the most popular beer.Spirits sell well. Snacks are available at lunchtime from Monday to Friday.There is a varied menu offering chicken,shepherd's pie,pastie,king rib,fish and various salads. The pub has a pool table and juke box.There is a darts and domino league and matches are played at home and away on Mondays and Tuesdays. Opening times from Monday to Saturday are 10am.-2.30pm.and 6pm.-11pm.On Sunday they are 12noon-2pm.and 7pm.- 10.30pm. The Black Swan is owned by Mann's Brewery and tenanted by Mr.C.French.
